archimate:BusinessObject.name: GSQL
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
The GSQL® query language is the choice for fast and scalable graph operations and analytics, for the cloud or on-premises. GSQL’s similarity to SQL, High-level syntax, Turing completeness, and built-in parallelism brings faster performance, faster development and the ability to describe any algorithm. Schema-based: Optimizes storage efficiency and query speed. Supports data-independent app/query development. Transactional graph updates: HTAP - Hybrid Transactional / Analytical Processing, with real-time data updates Procedural queries calling queries: Parameterized queries are flexible and can be used to build more complex queries Built-in high performance parallelism: Achieves the fastest results
Conventional control flow (FOR, WHILE, IF/ELSE): Makes it easy to implement conventional algorithms
